name: acne+ triple threat set with Salicylic Acid (BHA) + Niacinamide
about: What it is:A clinically tested trio that’s perfect for oily, acne-prone skin to visibly reduce blemishes and pores and absorb excess oil while supporting skin barrier health..Skin Type:Combination and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Salicylic Acid (BHA): Dives deep to decongest pores and absorb excess oil and surface debris..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This set for acne-prone skin is loaded with actives like salicylic acid (BHA) and niacinamide to reduce the size and intensity of blemishes and improve overall skin clarity. This regimen combats blemishes while being gentle to the barrier leaving skin calm, soothed, and non-irritated..This Set Contains:- 0.23 oz/ 7 mL acne+ adapinoid Gel..Clinical Results:Based on a clinical study as part of a 2-step regimen with acne+ cleanser:
ingredients: -Salicylic Acid (BHA): Dives deep to decongest pores and absorb excess oil and surface debris..-0.16% Adapinoid: Powerful retinoid is slowly released into skin to visibly reduce blemishes. .-2% Niacinamide: Potent antioxidant absorbs excess sebum, oiliness, and reduces visible redness...Azeaic Acid AHA/BHA Cleanser: .Water/Aqua/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Stearyl Alcohol, Bentonite, Propanediol, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glycolic Acid, Salicylic Acid, Niacinamide, Azelaic Acid, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Dextrin, Polydextrose, Amylopectin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol. 2201..Adapinoid Gel: .Water/Aqua/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Squalane, Solanum Tuberosum (Potato) Pulp Extract, Niacinamide, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Pisum Sativum Peptide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Oleyl Adapalenate, Glycerin, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Tocopherol, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Galactoarabinan, Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex, Maltodextrin, Schizophyllan, Polylysine, Tripeptide-1, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Magnesium Stearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Dextran, citric acid, Phenoxyethanol. 2213..Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream: .Water (Aqua), Squalane, Propanediol, Niacinamide, Triheptanoin, Saccharide Isomerate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Zinc PCA, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Allantoin, Camellia Sinensis Seed Extract, Leptospermone, Flavesone, Isoleptospermone, Acetyl Heptapeptide-4, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, C14-22 Alcohols, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start by cleansing skin with the Azelaic Acid BHA/AHA Cleanser morning and night. Dispense a pea-size amount onto damp palms and work into a lather. Rinse thoroughly with warm water..-Follow with the adapinoid gel. Apply a small amount all over face at night when first using this product. As skin acclimates, use twice a day..-Lastly, moisturize with Skinfix's Skin Barrier Restoring Gel Cream. Apply to face and neck morning and night. ..Recycling Instructions:.-Check locally on recyclability due to size of components..-All components are mono-material and recycle ready.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cleared my skin up. O've tried so many different products and am relieved that I finally found Skinfix. Some people have mentioned the smell but it just smells like a clay mask. I have matur(ing) skin that has decided to become oily (used to be dry) with occasional breakouts.  I bought the sample size which lasts about a week or so. It leaves my skin soft and clear.

After using these products for a couple months I have noticed an extreme difference in my skin. I have been struggling with acne for years and have been searching for the products right for me. When I started using skinfix I knew I had found the right products for my skin. I highly recommend these products they cleared up my skin within a month

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect to start a routine to get rid of your acne. I really liked it and upgraded my size. I would recommend this item to try it for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never had bad acne, but after having children, I don't know what happened. Suddenly, my skin would have occasional breakouts. I love the face wash and the spot treatment. It has really helped with the breakouts. The cream, unfortunately, is too greasy and leaves my skin a bit irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I recently ordered it and it’s working for me. Thank you, Skinfix!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I only used the wash and the moisturizer and it helped a lot to clear my acne. Would recommend to people with the same skin type.

reviews.review_title: A good complete system for daily use
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t sure if this set would work for me as my skin can be very sensitive, but I did a gradual shift and have been pleasantly surprised.   The face wash was gentle but effective and left my skin feeling clean. If I wore makeup that day I did need to use a cleansing brush to lift it all, but it did leave my face clean in the end. Initially, I was unsure about the texture of the moisturizer gel but after a few weeks I noticed one day that my dry patches had shrunk and the rest of my face was baby soft. The spot cream I only used sparingly and can’t say for sure that it made a difference but it didn’t hurt and my skin did settle fairly soon after using it.   Overall, a good set for everyday use and the moisturizer gel is the star for combo skin like mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this set is not for me. The spot treatment broke me out terribly! I applied it to 2 pimples, and I woke up the next day with a cluster of pimples in the area that I applied the product. Made my breakout so much worse. The face wash is nice, but it doesn't foam and it's not great for makeup removal. The gel cream wasn't for me. It contributed to my breakouts and made my forehead break out (I never get breakouts there)... Since I stopped using this set and returned it, my skin has completely cleared up. Also, the quantity of product is really not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There’s supposed to be 7ml in the gel tube but I don’t think there was more than 1 mL in there … I just got mine today so I can’t say much about this product. I do like the texture of the creams but I’m very disappointed that I can’t really try out the gel without.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give the Skinfix Acne+ Triple Threat Set with Salicylic Acid (BHA) + Niacinamide with B-L3™ a million stars, I would. This product is nothing short of miraculous.  I've struggled with acne for years, trying countless products with disappointing results. But the Acne+ Triple Threat Set has completely transformed my skin. Not only has it cleared my acne completely, but it does so without drying out my skin—a common issue with many acne treatments.  What truly sets this set apart is its ability to create the perfect barrier for makeup applications. No more worrying about my makeup clogging pores or causing breakouts. With this set, my skin feels smooth, hydrated, and ready for flawless makeup every time.  I can't emphasize enough how much of a game-changer this product has been for me. It's eliminated clogged pores, prevented breakouts, and given me the clear, radiant skin I've always dreamed of.  If you're struggling with acne or clogged pores, I HIGHLY recommend giving the Skinfix Acne+ Triple Threat Set a try. It's a true miracle product that delivers on its promises and then some.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this Skinfix acne kit. It has clear my skin and given me confidence that I haven't had before. My skin is now so soft and clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been having breakouts on my chin and neck area for the last couple of months.  After using this product for 3 days I saw a reduction in redness on previous blemishes and overall my skin started to look clearer.  I would recommend these products

reviews.review_title: Staples in a teen boy skin routine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My son has been using SkinFix products for a few years now, since we introduced him to taking proper care of his skin. He was excited when the Acne+ line came out and has been using them since they were released. While he still gets some pimples, like all teenagers, his skin overall looks great, is well moisturized and he feels like the products make a difference. He loves weight of Skin Barrier repairing gel and so far the new formulation seems to be working well, He even tells his friends about Skinfix! Thanks!

reviews.review_title: A must have if you have acne concerns
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: An amazing product for my son who has major acne! I saw a huge difference after a couple of weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These products are amazing for oily and acne prone skin. I've noticed how quickly they reduce the visibility of pores and other blemishes. I definitely recommend for people who are looking for an incredibly safe and healthy way to treat their skin. My skin is soft and glowy and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My teenage son used these products and noticed a big difference in his skin! We love this brand and this set does not disappoint. Highly recommend for those with acne or acne prone skin.

reviews.review_title: Bye Bye Acne and Hello Glow
reviews.review_text: I love SkinFix and this product has done SO much for improving my adult acne. Not to mention, it makes my skin extra soft, shiny, and plump! I love that it’s vegan and has sustainable packaging, too. If you’re looking for something new to try, give this a go. Old lady approved who is feeling like a young woman!
